text: Michel Fernando Costa (March 11, 1981 – October 8, 2017) was a Brazilian footballer who played in the Gambrinus liga for SK Slavia Prague and 1. FK Příbram. Michel has played in the Campeonato Brasileiro for CR Vasco da Gama. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Brazilian footballers Category:CR Vasco da Gama players Category:Grêmio Barueri Futebol players Category:Czech First League players Category:SK Slavia Prague players Category:FK Baník Sokolov players Category:1. title: Michel Fernando Costa
